## DeepPropType type

Get the value type of a deep property [DeepProp](./global-types.deepprop.md) TPath on TObject.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type DeepPropType<TObject, TPath extends string, TElse> = TPath extends keyof TObject ? TObject[TPath] : TPath extends `${infer LeftSide}.${infer RightSide}` ? LeftSide extends keyof TObject ? DeepPropType<TObject[LeftSide], RightSide, TElse> : TElse : TElse;
```
<b>References:</b> [DeepPropType](./global-types.deepproptype.md)
